are_you_sure_stop_recording: Are you sure you want to stop recording this route?
are_you_sure_cancel_recording: Are you sure you want to cancel recording this route? The recording will be lost and cannot be recovered.
recording_prompt_message: You are currently recording a route. Please stop or cancel the recording before proceeding.
no_recording_data: You do not have enough recording data or route information. Please try again later.
pause_recording_message: Route recording has been paused because you exited the app. Do you want to continue recording?
